grades.name: NO PLAN
grades.exclusions: Enhanced External Counter Pulsation Therapy, Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy, Quantum Magnetic Resonance Therapy, Alcohol Drug illness, Breech Of Law, Convalescence, Cosmetic, Dental (except accidental injuries), Exclusions, Hazardous Sports, Health Check, Rest Cure, Ritual Circumcision, Self Injury, Sterility, War, Alcohol Drug Abuse, Voluntary Termination Pregnancy, Newborn Well Baby Care, Hearing Aid (except for ESCP)

grades.remarks:
Keratoconus treatment is covered,Sleep Apnea Treatment is covered; cost of device on rental basis (device purchase not covered),Fracture of Bones: Includes treatment for fractures, hairline fractures, dislocation of bones/joints, ligament tear, and similar injuries treated in less than 24 hours.
Donor Expenses are covered.

grades.name: NO PLAN
grades.exclusions: Extensive exclusions apply including but not limited to national emergencies, obesity treatments, cosmetic surgeries, investigations not related to hospitalization, optometric therapy, experimental treatments, non-allopathic treatments, preventive care, convenience items, OPD consultations not covered under certain conditions, and specific exclusions for genetic and congenital conditions for parents.
grades.inclusions: Various benefits including maternity, infertility treatments up to maternity limit (with exclusions for family planning), congenital diseases, cancer treatments, specific surgeries, living together relationships, psychiatric disorders in ESC policy, Domiciliary Hospitalization, among others are covered under certain conditions. Specific inclusions for hospital treatments involving listed daycare procedures.
grades.remarks: - Coverage extension supports living together relationships, third gender members, differently abled dependent child with 40% disability (with disability certificate), congenital diseases.Enhanced maternity limit of INR 65,000 for complications and regular maternity costs based on applicable sub-limits. Policies have detailed exclusions like lifestyle, non-emergency treatments, routine checkups, dental surgeries unless hospitalization is required.Check for updated daycare procedures

grades.name: NO PLAN
grades.exclusions:
- Specific waiting periods waived (30-day, 1-year, 9-months for maternity).
- General outpatient (OPD) conditions under maternity, infertility, routine checkups, non-allopathic treatments, cosmetic procedures unless specified otherwise.- Specific pre-existing diseases covered from day one. Capped procedures where overall limits exceed policy specifications.
grades.inclusions: 12 modern treatments (e.g., Robotic surgery, Immunotherapy, Stem cell therapy for certain conditions, etc.). - Advanced cancer treatments, psychiatric, and mental wellness up to INR 200,000 on IPD & OPD basis.- Neurodiversity treatment, external congenital conditions if life-threatening.  Critical illness buffer details apply. Multiple births and third independent children covered.
grades.remarks: State Street policy co-pays are to be applied only on the payable amounts. Enhance AYUSH limit to 50% of the sum insured. Portability options available upon leaving the company. Additional ambulance charges covered per person up to INR 5,000. Active work-related cover if an employee falls sick within office premises. Certain exclusions apply for capped ailments or policies not aligned with ERDAI guidelines.

grades.name: NO PLAN
grades.exclusions: This policy does not cover treatments or expenses related to Alcohol or Drug abuse, Breach of Law, Convalescence, Cosmetic surgery, Hazardous Sports, Rest Cures, Ritual Circumcision, Self-inflicted Injury, Sexually Transmitted Diseases, Sterility, War-related injuries, Health Checkups, Voluntary Termination of Pregnancy, Egg Freezing, Hearing Aids, HIV/AIDS, Hormonal Therapy, Enhanced External Counter Pulsation Therapy, Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy.
grades.inclusions: Waiver of pre-existing conditions exclusions (4.1, 4.2, 4.3). Coverage for modern treatments subject to specified limits. Surrogacy-related costs covered under specified conditions and limits
grades.remarks: Waiver of proportionate deduction on room rent per Ticket No: 21461830. Hormonal chemotherapy covered up to INR 2,00,000 within FSI (first 100 cases only). Special Child OPD deleted. 16 modern treatments covered with specific limits. COVID home care covered under conditions. Maximum age for dependent child is 25 years; group coverage up to 80 years. Family definition includes live-in partner of opposite gender or LGBT.

grades.name: NO PLAN
grades.exclusions: This policy does not cover treatments or expenses related to Alcohol or Drug abuse, Breach of Law, Convalescence, Cosmetic surgery, Hazardous Sports, Rest Cures, Ritual Circumcision, Self-inflicted Injury, Sexually Transmitted Diseases, Sterility, War-related injuries, Health Checkups, Voluntary Termination of Pregnancy, Egg Freezing, Hearing Aids, HIV/AIDS, Hormonal Therapy, Enhanced External Counter Pulsation Therapy, Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy.
grades.inclusions: Waiver of pre-existing conditions exclusions (4.1, 4.2, 4.3). Coverage for modern treatments subject to specified limits. Surrogacy-related costs covered under specified conditions and limit.
grades.remarks: Normal Maternity Limit increased to INR 100,000, C-Section Maternity Limit increased to INR 125,000 for top-up members opting above INR 400,000. Cataract claims payable up to INR 60,000 per eye, with no lens restriction. Delay condonation above 90 days attracts 10% co-pay for delayed claims. Reasonable & customary clause applies. No capping on modern treatments per New India Flexi Floater Policy terms. Pre and Post-natal cover revised to 45 days post discharge. Family definition includes live-in partner of opposite gender or LGBT. Voluntary and cosmetic procedures generally excluded.

grades.inclusions: Waiver of pre-existing conditions exclusions (4.1, 4.2, 4.3). Coverage for modern treatments subject to specified caps
grades.remarks: Various benefits include extensive Covid-19 treatment cover, flexible sum assured for family members, top-up options, preferential rates for eye checks for specific grades (capped at INR 35,000), and maternity covers for multiple births. Room rent waivers and inclusive definitions for family coverage, including surgical correction of refractive errors beyond specified caps, are notable advantages.

grades.remarks: Claims settled on scanned documents without attestation; corporate buffer up to ₹2 Cr on family floater basis; in-patient psychiatric care covered; road and air ambulance services are covered; organ donor charges covered excluding cost of organ.

grades.name: NO PLAN
grades.exclusions: The policy does not cover Enhanced External Counter Pulsation Therapy and related therapies, Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy, Cochlear Implants, application/insertion/removal procedures on the inner ear, other vaccinations or inoculations, and gender reassignment surgery. It excludes Bariatric/Gastric Bypass/Sleeve Gastrectomy procedures for morbid obesity, Roux-en-Y Bypass. Also excluded are alcohol/drug illness and abuse, breach of law, convalescence, cosmetic procedures, hazardous sports, health check-ups, rest cures, ritual circumcision, self-injury, STD treatments, sterility, war-related injuries, new-born well-baby care, hearing aids, obesity treatments, pre and post-natal care, surrogacy delivery, dental treatments, and voluntary termination of pregnancy
grades.inclusions: Covers include mental health, infertility, IVF (under OPD too), maternity up to ₹1,00,000, organ donation costs (excluding the organ), surrogacy up to ₹35,000, and congenital external anomalies under specific conditions.
grades.remarks: Special features include: Corporate Buffer up to ₹2.5 Cr for major diseases; Maternity and child care defined extensively including embryo freezing; Critical illness lump-sum benefits; Terrorism coverage included.

grades.name: NO PLAN
grades.exclusions: Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy, Enhanced External Counter Pulsation Therapy (EECP), Quantum Magnetic Resonance Therapy, Autism treatment, Hazardous Sports, Rest Cure, Ritual Circumcision, Voluntary Termination of Pregnancy, War-related injuries, Cosmetic procedures, Egg Freezing, Alcohol and Drug Abuse, Sexually Transmitted Diseases (STDs), Sterility, Alcohol and Drug Illness, Breech of Law, Convalescence, Dental treatments (except due to accident), Health Check-ups, Pre and Post-Natal care for non-hospitalized patients, and Maternity Complications.
grades.inclusions: Mental health, Infertility treatments, All advance treatments up to SI except specified otherwise, Congenital internal conditions, Genetic conditions, COVID and other vaccinations as per guidelines, Organ donation costs (excluding the cost of the organ)
grades.remarks: Corporate Buffer up to ₹20 Cr for major diseases, Non-paper-based claims up to ₹2,00,000, Flu vaccinations and diagnostic covers available, Day Care Procedures and Telemedicine allowed, Coverage extends to conditions like mental health, certain disabilities, and has provisions for treatments during temporary hospitalization for COVID-related issues, Provisions for employees with critical illnesses and death-in-hospital clauses

grades.name: NO PLAN
grades.exclusions: Includes RFQMR, Retrograde intra renal surgery, Toric Lens, KT Laser Prostate, Holter Monitoring, Cosmetic or Plastic Surgery, Alcohol and Drug Abuse, Hazardous Sports, War-related injuries, Pre and Post-Natal (if not hospitalized), Infertility Treatment on trial basis, Investigations and Evaluations.
grades.inclusions: Covers obesity and weight control treatments if medically necessary, mental health, genetic conditions, AYUSH treatment in government hospitals, emergency ambulance services up to ₹2,500, and modern treatments covered up to full SI.
grades.remarks: Corporate Buffer up to ₹20 Lakhs per family cannot be used for maternity or claims with ailment capping; Maternity benefits include up to ₹150,000 for normal delivery and ₹200,000 for C-section, applicable for the first two deliveries only. Pre-existing diseases are covered without waiting periods.

grades.name: NO PLAN
grades.exclusions: Bariatric Surgery (unless BMI ≥40 or ≥35 with comorbidities), Cosmetic Surgery without medical necessity, Experimental treatments, Obesity/Weight Control procedures unless medically indicated, Non-prescription supplements.
grades.inclusions: Mental health, AYUSH treatment, HIV or AIDS, Well Baby Cover, Maternity Benefits, Animal Bite or Serpent Bite, advanced modern treatments without any sub-limit restrictions.
grades.remarks: Bariatric surgery is covered when the BMI is ≥40, or ≥35 for cases with comorbidities; Corporate Buffer of ₹2 Cr available; Pre-existing conditions have waived waiting periods.

grades.name: NO PLAN
grades.exclusions: Psychological counseling, Naturopathy, Nuclear weapons-related conditions, cosmetic surgeries without medical indication, spectacles, hearing aids, intentional self-injury, use of drugs/alcohol, war-related perils, etc.
grades.inclusions: Covers various modern and advanced treatments, genetic disorders, mental health conditions, HIV/AIDS, AYUSH treatments, terrorism-related hospitalizations, organ transplant donor expenses, and trauma/disease-related dental treatments requiring hospitalization.
grades.remarks: Bariatric surgery is covered when the BMI is ≥40, or ≥35 for cases with comorbidities. Waivers on first-year, 30-day waiting periods, and pre-existing conditions. Corporate Buffer available up to ₹40 Lakh per family.

grades.name: TP1
grades.exclusions: Cosmetic procedures, pre and post-delivery expenses for surrogacy
grades.inclusions: COVID home care, mental health, congenital diseases, robotic surgeries, advanced medical treatment, maternity coverage, Ayurvedic treatments, biopsy, newborn baby coverage, CAPD, PET Scan, Cyber-knife, Oral Chemotherapy, Monoclonal Antibody treatment, Autism treatment, HIV/AIDS treatment, gender reassignment, LGBT coverage, corporate buffer
grades.remarks: Coverage for same-sex/domestic partners with a lock-in of 2 years; Corporate buffer of INR 50 Lakhs for critical conditions; Cataract coverage up to INR 50,000; Home care treatment for COVID-19 up to INR 15,000 per person; Ambulance charges up to INR 5,000; Air ambulance charges covered; Optometrist prescriptions from Lenskart and Titan Eye accepted without additional prescription. 9-month waiting period for maternity claims, relaxed in case of medical emergencies; Dual maternity coverage for Walmart employees; Enhanced maternity and infertility limits available; No capping on cataract for unifocal lens, multifocal lens up to INR 50,000; Listed mental illnesses covered up to INR 25,000 for OPD.

grades.name: NO PLAN
grades.exclusions: Misuse of drugs/alcohol, cosmetic dental treatments
grades.inclusions: HIV/AIDS, Hepatitis, Mental Health, Neurodiverse Conditions, Ayurveda & Homeopathy
grades.remarks: Coverage includes various advanced treatments like gender reassignment. Corporate Buffer: Rs. 1 crore with a limit of 4 times the Floater Sum Insured per family. Policy Period: 01/07/2025 to 30/06/2026. Family Definition: Employee + Spouse + 2 dependent Children (up to 25 years) + 2 Dependent Parents/Parents-in-law (up to 80 years). Special Conditions: Gender Reassignment and LGBTQ Buffer of Rs. 20 lakhs; Surrogacy covered up to maternity limit; No age limit for neurodiverse children coverage. Sub-limits Waived: Room Charges, Medical Practitioners Fees, and other hospitalisation expenses. Additional Coverage: Includes emergency ambulance charges, internal congenital diseases, and day care procedures as per standard GMC policy.  Co-Pay Buy Back - 10% Co-pay buy back option (Employees opting for Co-pay Buy Back will have the same Co-pay in Base, Top-up and Parent policies)

grades.name: NO PLAN
grades.exclusions: De-addiction program, confinement for primary purpose, obstructive sleep apnoea, breach of law, convalescence, cosmetic, dental, egg freezing, alcohol drug abuse, hazardous sports, health check, rest cure, ritual circumcision, STD, voluntary termination of pregnancy, war, alcohol drug illness, sleep studies CPAP, Alzheimer's disease, hearing aid, self-injury, donor expenses, hyperbaric oxygen therapy, enhanced external counter pulsation therapy, peritoneal dialysis, quantum magnetic resonance therapy
grades.inclusions: Congenital diseases, gender realignment surgery, HIV, behavioral and psychiatric treatments, family planning complications, resuscitation expenses, suicide cases, ARMD, maternity, infertility treatments, domiciliary expenses, critical illness, COVID-19, ASD, family planning procedures, Parkinson’s, Alzheimer’s, gene therapy, sleep apnoea
grades.remarks: Coverage for both inpatient and outpatient procedures, including a wide range of day-care procedures and enhancements for 2025 & 2026

grades.name: 1+3 Resources
grades.exclusions: Alcohol drug illness, breach of law, convalescence, cosmetic, egg freezing, hazardous sports, health check, rest cure, ritual circumcision, self-injury, STD, sterility, war, congenital external, congenital external life-threatening conditions, alcohol drug abuse, voluntary termination of pregnancy, surrogacy delivery, IVF for infertility, newborn well-baby care, enhanced external counter pulsation therapy, hyperbaric oxygen therapy, gender reassignment surgery, quantum magnetic resonance therapy, animal bite, HIV/AIDS
grades.inclusions: Congenital internal diseases, behavioral and psychiatric treatments, family planning complications, resuscitation expenses, suicide cases, ARMD, maternity (with specified limits), infertility treatments (excluding IVF), domiciliary expenses, critical illness, COVID-19, ASD, family planning procedures, Parkinson’s, Alzheimer’s, gene therapy, sleep apnoea
grades.remarks: Coverage includes comprehensive benefits for both inpatient and outpatient procedures, home care for COVID-19, and enhancements for 2025 & 2026. Bariatric surgery is covered when BMI is ≥ 40, or ≥ 35 for co-morbid cases. Specific conditions apply for certain treatments and geographical limits.

grades.remarks: Coverage includes comprehensive benefits for both inpatient and outpatient procedures, home care for COVID-19, and enhancements for 2025 & 2026. grades.name: NO PLAN
grades.exclusions: Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy, Quantum Magnetic Resonance Therapy, Enhanced External Counter Pulsation Therapy, Gender Reassignment Surgery, Alcohol/Drug Illness, Breach of Law, Congenital External (Life-Threatening), Convalescence, Cosmetic, Dental, Egg Freezing, Hazardous Sports, Health Check, Rest Cure, Ritual Circumcision, Self Injury, STD, Sterility, War, Congenital External, Alcohol/Drug Abuse, Surrogacy Delivery, Newborn Well Baby Care, Maternity Complications, Hearing Aid, HIV/AIDS
grades.inclusions: Pre-existing diseases covered from Day One
grades.remarks: Room rent limit does not include other charges like Nursing Charges, OT Charges, Doctor Fees, etc. Bariatric surgery is covered when BMI is ≥ 40, or ≥ 35 for co-morbid cases. Mid-term inclusion of dependent members is applicable with two enrollment periods: one at the start of the policy term and another after 3 months. Mortuary charges are covered up to INR 10,000 per incident. Artificial life/limb support and Haemodialysis/Radiotherapy are covered under the Floater Sum Insured.

grades.name: NO PLAN
grades.exclusions: OPD treatments/procedures, non-approved drugs, non-admissible amounts, room rent restrictions for higher category rooms
grades.inclusions: Pre-existing diseases, congenital internal diseases, standalone blood transfusion, daycare procedures, advanced cancer treatments, HIV under specific conditions, income protection benefit, emergency ambulance charges, bereavement coverage, animal/serpent attack treatment, Lasik surgery for eye correction more than +/- 7, nasal sinus surgeries, gamma knife treatment, stem cell transplantation, robotic surgery, laser eye treatment
grades.remarks: Corporate buffer of INR 7,500,000 with primary buffer of INR 50 lakhs and secondary buffer of INR 2,500,000 for critical illness. Cross combination coverage in case of demise of one dependent parent/parent-in-law. Surrogacy covered within maternity limit for first child only. Advanced cancer treatments covered up to Sum Insured, top-up policy triggers after Base Policy SI is exhausted. Modern treatments listed by New India standard sub-limits apply, except for cancer treatments. Coverage for same gender partner subject to corporate declaration. AYUSH treatments admissible up to 25% of Sum Insured in recognized institutions. Income protection benefit for loss of income due to illness. Emergency ambulance charges covered as per actuals. Widow/Widower coverage continues till policy expiry.

grades.name: L01 to L12
grades.exclusions: Non-approved drugs, OPD treatments/procedures, room rent restrictions for higher category rooms
grades.inclusions: Pre-existing diseases from Day 1, congenital diseases, new joiners from Day 1, domiciliary hospitalization, advanced treatments/procedures, genetic disorders, biological drugs, invasive diagnostics, ambulance expenses up to INR 3,000
grades.remarks: Midterm increases in sum insured allowed in case of appraisal or error. Coverage for same gender partner subject to corporate declaration. AYUSH treatments admissible up to 25% of SI. Emergency ambulance charges as per actuals. Room eligibility varies by grade.
